body_html:
Interesting, when I build without the -j 1 I get a random error, either from six_archive or from //google/protobuf:python_srcs_genrule.

I've run the build again using -j 1 and this now consistently shows the following error:
ERROR: /local.mnt/vol1/development/alexander/tensorflow/google/protobuf/BUILD:497:1: Executing genrule //google/protobuf:python_srcs_genrule failed: bash failed: error executing command

When I try to build only this package by itself, using:
bazel build -s -j 1 --verbose_failures //google/protobuf:python_srcs_genrule
I get the following output:

http://pastebin.com/GSZNpiRW

body: Interesting, when I build without the -j 1 I get a random error, either from six_archive or from //google/protobuf:python_srcs_genrule. I've run the build again using -j 1 and this now consistently shows the following error: ERROR: /local.mnt/vol1/development/alexander/tensorflow/google/protobuf/BUILD:497:1: Executing genrule //google/protobuf:python_srcs_genrule failed: bash failed: error executing command When I try to build only this package by itself, using: bazel build -s -j 1 --verbose_failures //google/protobuf:python_srcs_genrule I get the following output: http://pastebin.com/GSZNpiRW
